message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Alice, I understand your position, but $14,000 is still above what I can afford right now. I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is my final offer.
